name: Pohx Keepers Restart - Private League
description:
Keepers of the Flame Private League For Path of Exile 1 is Underway. Looking to host it THIS Friday (09.01.2025), 8am pst.
GGG Will be funding slots so no need to worry about crowdfunding. For players who aren't sure what a private league is. It's essentially an Economy Reset of the league we just played. In this instance Keepers of the Flame. You can also trade just like normal and even setup your Awakened PoE Trade to the private league. Think of it as a miniature PoE1 League but with nothing new.

name: The Legacy of Phrecia
description: Embrace the bizarre when the Legacy of Phrecia returns to Path of Exile on January 29th (PST)! With 19 alternate Ascendancy classes, battle through areas altered by map modifiers, and face enraged bosses that push your builds and your skill to the limit.
